reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Equipping educational laboratories at the Faculty of Medicine and Health Sciences at the University of Aden

description.narrative: 1. Preparing educational laboratories to provide access to students and faculty members at the University of Aden. 2. Furnishing educational laboratories with appropriate educational equipment to create an interactive environment that attracts learning. 3. Providing educational means to improve and enhance the educational process.

Contribute to improving the quality of educational programs for health laboratories at the College of Medicine and Health Sciences at the University of Aden by preparing and equipping the laboratory department and the Anatomical Museum department, and providing them with the necessary educational means to allow male and female students and faculty members access to the anatomical pieces that support their educational journey, training and continuous development, under economic conditions. The harsh conditions that government educational institutions are going through

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
